purpose: Provide a comprehensive collection of system prompts to assist developers in building and optimizing AI agents across multiple platforms.
principle: Aggregates and organizes system prompts for popular AI tools, enabling easy access and usage by developers.
reusability: Offers a library of prompts that can be easily integrated into AI development workflows for tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and others.
limitations: Primarily focused on prompt curation; does not include tools for prompt generation or customization.
name: awesome-ai-system-prompts

highlight: Curated collection of system prompts for various AI tools, aiding AI agent builders and prompt engineers.
